name: Locky Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with a .thor extension is a file encrypted by the Locky trojan horse virus, which is malware utilized by cybercriminals. It contains a user's file, such as an .AVI or .XLSX file, encrypted with the RSA-2048 algorithm and AES-128 ciphers. AESIR files became prevalent in 2016 as a Locky Virus variant and are similar to .LOCKY files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
